trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zones and are used to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Serve como a classe base para controles que residem em <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> zonas e são usados para editar <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controles.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPart class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived EditorPart controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom EditorPart controls.
trans-unit.target: A classe de EditorPart fornece um conjunto básico de propriedades e métodos que são usados pelos controles de EditorPart derivados fornecidos com o conjunto de controles de Web Parts e por controles de EditorPart personalizados.

trans-unit.source: An EditorPart control allows a user to edit an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Um controle EditorPart permite que um usuário editar um associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle modificando seu layout, aparência, propriedades, comportamento ou outras características.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The editing user interface (UI), which consists of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zones that contain EditorPart controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: A edição interface do usuário (IU), que consiste em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zonas que contêm controles de EditorPart, é exibida depois que uma página da Web entra em modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An EditorPart control can be used only within a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > EditorPart um controle pode ser usado somente dentro de uma zona que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>classe, como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: Depois que uma página entrou no modo de edição, um usuário pode selecionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle para editar clicando em um verbo de edição no menu de verbos do controle selecionado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time.
trans-unit.target: Apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle pode ser editado por vez.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Several derived EditorPart controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Vários controles de EditorPart derivados são fornecidos com o conjunto de controles de Web Parts, conforme listado na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications.
trans-unit.target: Esses controles fornecem todos os recursos de edição que são necessários para a maioria dos aplicativos.

trans-unit.source: The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `<zonetemplate>` element, where `<zonetemplate>` is the child element of an `<asp:editorzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: A abordagem típica para usar esses controles em uma página de Web Parts é declará-los no formato de persistência de página dentro de um `<zonetemplate>` elemento, onde `<zonetemplate>` é o elemento filho de um `<asp:editorzone>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte a seção exemplo deste tópico.

trans-unit.source: |Type of control|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>|Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>|Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de controle | Descrição | |---------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>| Edita a aparência do controle associado, incluindo propriedades como o texto do título, altura, largura e atributos de borda. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>| Edita determinados comportamentos do controle associado, como se ele pode ser editado, se ele pode ser fechado ou se ela pode ser movida para outra zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>|Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>|Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.| > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, all the EditorPart controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: Este controle só é visível em uma página quando um controle está sendo editado no escopo de personalização compartilhado. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>| Edições de atributos de layout para o controle associado, como se ele está em estado normal ou minimizado (recolhido) e qual zona ele é colocado no. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>| Edita as propriedades do controle associado, se essas propriedades foram declaradas no código-fonte com um `WebBrowsable` atributo. | > [!NOTE] > Para melhorar a acessibilidade, todos o EditorPart controla fornecido em Web Parts, o conjunto de controle são renderizadas dentro de um `<fieldset>` elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given EditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: O `<fieldset>` elemento agrupa um conjunto relacionado de controles usados para edição em um dado controle EditorPart e facilita a navegação com guias entre esses controles para os agentes do usuário visual (como navegadores comuns) e os agentes de usuário orientada a fala (como o software de leitura de tela).

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a classe para uso por uma instância de classe herdada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor pode ser chamado somente por uma classe herdada.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Salva os valores em uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle para as propriedades correspondentes na associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é um método crítico em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: Ele é definido como um método abstrato no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e deve ser implementado por controles herdados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Finalidade do método é salvar os valores que um usuário tiver inserido em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle para as propriedades correspondentes no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle que é referenciado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é chamado quando o usuário clica em um botão que representa um Okey ou um verbo aplicar na interface do usuário edição (IU).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação de salvar os valores do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> o controle para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle for bem-sucedida; caso contrário (se ocorrer um erro), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um controle deve ser exibido quando seus associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control checks the Display property to determine whether to display the control.
trans-unit.target: Em determinados pontos a edição process, a zona que contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle verifica a propriedade de exibição para determinar se o controle de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: There are two scenarios where the Display property returns `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Há dois cenários em que a propriedade de exibição retorna `false` e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle não é exibido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro cenário ocorre quando o controle que está sendo editado um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.
trans-unit.target: O segundo cenário ocorre quando o controle que está sendo editado tem seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>propriedades definidas como `true`, enquanto o escopo de personalização da página é definido no nível do usuário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se o controle deve ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto do título exibido na barra de título de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property returns either the current value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DisplayTitle retorna o valor atual da base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>propriedade ou, se o controle não tem um título, um valor calculado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls.
trans-unit.target: O valor calculado consiste em uma cadeia de caracteres de recurso localizável para controles sem título.

trans-unit.source: In the cases where no value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property, the value of the DisplayTitle property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nos casos em que nenhum valor é atribuído para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>propriedade, o valor da propriedade DisplayTitle difere de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the DisplayTitle property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Porque a propriedade DisplayTitle é projetada para ser somente leitura, uma propriedade calculada para obter o valor real atual do título exibido em tempo de execução, não tente usar esta propriedade para definir um título para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: To set a title, use the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir um título, use a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o título completo, visível do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres calculada, específicos de cultura fornecida pelo .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current state of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control's parent zone.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o estado atual de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> zona do pai do controle.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignModeState method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignModeState retorna informações sobre o estado da zona que contém um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: As informações de estado são retornadas na forma de um dicionário.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that has the current state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>com o estado atual de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> zona que contém um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In addition to calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method, the OnPreRender method also checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Além de chamar a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>método, o método OnPreRender também verifica a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is also set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `false`, que significa que o controle não deve ser exibido, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>propriedade também é definida como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the characteristics of the design-mode state to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se as características do estado modo de design para atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> zona que contém um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains state data for displaying the zone.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contém os dados de estado para exibir a zona.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control for its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera os valores de propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle de seus associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é um método crítico em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: Ele é definido como um método abstrato no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e deve ser implementado por controles herdados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property, and update the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: A finalidade do método é recuperar os valores atuais do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle referenciado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade e atualizar os campos a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle com esses valores para um usuário pode editá-los.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é chamado sempre que os valores associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle pode ter alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona que contém o controle chama o método SyncChanges imediatamente depois de chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>método, para que os valores a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle sempre são sincronizados com os valores associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Outro caso em que o método SyncChanges é chamado é quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle está no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SyncChanges method is not called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SyncChanges o método não é chamado após o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>método se esse método retornar `false`, pois, nesse caso, um erro ocorreu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle associado à página da Web atual.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control needs a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle precisa de uma referência para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>instância porque ele deve verificar o escopo atual de personalização da página para determinar o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope is determined by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Escopo de personalização é determinado pela verificação de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>propriedade, que é acessada por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> on the page.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> na página.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle (ou outro controle de servidor ou usuário) que está sendo editado corresponde ao valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the WebPartToEdit property provides a reference to that control.
trans-unit.target: Apenas um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle pode ser editado por vez e quando um controle está no modo de edição, a propriedade WebPartToEdit fornece uma referência para esse controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone has added the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> property to the WebPartToEdit property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Após a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona adicionou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle à sua coleção de controles, em seguida, atribui o valor de seu próprio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade para a propriedade WebPartToEdit no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control uses the WebPartToEdit property especially in its two critical methods--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>--to get and set the property values on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle usa a propriedade WebPartToEdit especialmente em seus dois métodos críticos –<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>– para obter e definir os valores de propriedade para o controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> que está atualmente em modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> zona que contém um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Although the Zone property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.
trans-unit.target: Embora a propriedade de zona é somente leitura, ele fornece uma referência para o objeto de zona que contém o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controle e você pode alterar os valores de propriedade sobre a zona programaticamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> que contém o controle.
